com.browxy.gfx.browxy.tools.api.message

Class ResponseBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.browxy.gfx.browxy.tools.api.message.ResponseBuilder

  • public class ResponseBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class for building JSON responses in a standardized format. This class provides methods to construct JSON responses with various data types and maintains a consistent structure for API responses.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int FAIL
      Status code for failed responses
      static int OK
      Status code for successful responses

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ResponseBuilder()
      Constructs a new ResponseBuilder with default OK status code.
      ResponseBuilder(int statusCode)
      Constructs a new ResponseBuilder with the specified status code.

        Returns:
        this ResponseBuilder for method chaining

      • mergeJsonObjects

        public JsonObject mergeJsonObjects(JsonObject source,
                                   JsonObject target)
        Merges two JsonObjects recursively, with properties from the target taking precedence. If both objects have the same property and both values are JsonObjects, they are merged recursively.
        Parameters:
        source - the source JsonObject
        target - the target JsonObject whose properties take precedence
        Returns:
        a new JsonObject containing the merged properties

      • toJson

        public java.lang.String toJson()
        Converts the response to a JSON string. The resulting JSON string will include null values and won't escape HTML characters.
        Returns:
        a JSON string representation of the response
